Title: Relates to electronic confirmation of information included in pay stubs
Summary: Relates to electronic confirmation of information included in pay stubs.
LawCode: Amd Title, Chap of 2019; amd ยง200, St Fin L (as proposed in S.2328 & A.4867)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend a chapter of the laws of 2019, amending the state finance law relating to providing the option to employees of electronic confirmation of direct deposit in lieu of paper pay stubs, in relation to making technical changes to such chapter; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to electronic confirmation of information included in pay stubs
